title: Grading the Celtics' flurry of trades, plus every deal ahead of the NBA draft
description: Deals are already getting done ahead of the NBA draft. Catch up on the latest trade grades.
author: Kevin Pelton

title: Celtics to trade Porzingis to Hawks, sources say
description: Boston, Atlanta and Brooklyn are finalizing a trade that will send Kristaps Porzingis to the Hawks, Terance Mann to the Nets and Georges Niang to the Celtics, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania.
author: Tim Bontemps

title: 'Duckett would've infuriated me as a bowler - he's one of world's best'
description: Ben Duckett would be infuriating to bowl at and is establishing himself as one of the best all-format batters in the world, writes Jonathan Agnew.

title: Emotional Raducanu battles into Eastbourne second round
description: Emma Raducanu says her emotional reaction to her battling Eastbourne win was because she had received "some really bad news".

title: Stokes strikes late to leave England-India Test perfectly poised
description: India are two down, leading England by 96, going into the fourth morning of the first Test at Headingley after another hugely-absorbing day's play on Sunday.

title: Palace's Europa League prospects improve after Textor sells stake
description: Crystal Palace's hopes of playing in Europe next season appear to have been boosted after shareholder John Textor sold his stake in the club to New York Jets owner Woody Johnson.

title: Chase Burns strikes out 5 straight Yankees, including Aaron Judge in historic MLB debut against team he grew up rooting for
description: Aaron Judge was among the three MVPs Burns struck out in his first time through the Yankees order.
author: Jason Owens

title: WATCH: Tyler Warren highlights from Indianapolis Colts' minicamp
description: Take a look at some highlights of tight end Tyler Warren from the Indianapolis Colts' minicamp practices.
